headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SULIMIRSKI, WITOLD S

snippet: SULIMIRSKI--Witold S. May 18, 1933 - February 10, 2016. Beloved husband of Teresa and father of Ela, Adam and Eddie. There is a Celebration of Life, Friday, April 22 in Bronxville, NY. Catholic Funeral in Poland. A fund is set up in his honor at the Kosciuszko Foundation. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SULIMIRSKI--Witold S. May 18, 1933 - February 10, 2016. Beloved husband of Teresa and father of Ela, Adam and Eddie. There is a Celebration of Life, Friday, April 22 in Bronxville, NY. Catholic Funeral in Poland. A fund is set up in his honor at the Kosciuszko Foundation. 1/3
